summary: These are preparation notes for an interview with a former employee (JA) of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, detailing the existence and use of a comprehensive address book, the strict household manual and rules for staff, and the layout and operations at Epstein's Palm Beach residence. The notes document JA's recollections from the mid-1990s to 2002.

persons.name: Alessi
persons.role: Former employee of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referred to as 'JA' in the notes, he is the subject of the interview prep. He was a staff member at Epstein's Palm Beach residence from the mid-1990s to 2002 and provides detailed testimony about household operations, address books, and the staff manual.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as 'JE'. The owner of the Palm Beach residence where JA worked. The notes describe his use of address books, his desks, and his interactions with staff regarding the household manual.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referred to as 'GM'. Co-managed the Palm Beach household with Epstein. The notes detail her enforcement of the staff manual, her desk location, her bathroom, and her dog.

persons.name: Fiona
persons.context: Mentioned as one of the assistants who instructed JA to place the address book on various desks. Her role appears to be part of the household staff.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Named as one of the individuals whose contact information was contained in the address books kept at Epstein's Palm Beach residence.

persons.name: Donald Trump
persons.context: Named as one of the individuals whose contact information was contained in the address books kept at Epstein's Palm Beach residence.

connections.description: Co-managed the Palm Beach residence and its staff, jointly owned the address books and enforced the detailed household manual.
JA was employed by Jeffrey Epstein as household staff at his Palm Beach residence from the mid-1990s to 2002.
JA took direction from Ghislaine Maxwell regarding household duties and enforcement of the staff manual, leading to conflicts.
Prince Andrew's contact information was listed in Epstein's personal address book, indicating a social or professional connection.
Donald Trump's contact information was listed in Epstein's personal address book, indicating a social or professional connection.
Both were staff members at the Palm Beach residence; Fiona gave instructions to JA regarding the address book.

events.title: JA first observes address book
events.description: JA first sees the dark blue or black address book at Epstein's Palm Beach residence, estimating it was around 1994, 1995, or 1996.

events.title: Introduction of staff manual
events.description: In the late 1990s, a 'duchess from England' hired by Epstein and Maxwell provides JA with a detailed household manual outlining strict rules and checklists for staff.

events.title: JA ends employment
events.description: JA's employment at Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach residence concludes. He had observed the address books from the mid-1990s until this point.

locations: Ranch (referenced as a property with employees)
keyFacts: A comprehensive, annually updated address book (200-300 pages) was maintained at Epstein's Palm Beach residence, containing contacts for friends, employees, family, and notable figures like Prince Andrew and Donald Trump.

Staff were governed by an extremely detailed household manual with strict rules, including mandatory invisibility, non-disclosure of Epstein and Maxwell's behavior, and daily checklists for all tasks.
The address books were physically placed in multiple specific locations throughout the house (on desks, night tables, by phones) and were used primarily by Epstein and Maxwell.
Massages took place in Epstein's bathroom, and sex toys were kept in a basket in Maxwell's bathroom, both attached to the master bedroom.
Old versions of the address book were discarded when updated annually, and all staff were instructed not to talk to anyone about Epstein, Maxwell, or their guests.
